title: What-a-mess goes to school and other stories
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: Episode of Series "Children's circle". What-a-mess is a small, fat and scruffy Afghan hound puppy whose real name is Prince Amir Kinjan, but who is known to everbody as What-a-mess. In 'What-a-mess at the seaside', he is taken to the beach, where he makes a new friend who saves him from the incoming tide. 'What-a-mess goes to school', shows him attending Mrs. Tibbet's puppy training academy and finding the tuition difficult. 'Prince What-a-mess': What-a-mess decides to follow in his famous grandfather's footsteps, hunting the snow leopard in the Khyber Pass. 'Super what-a-mess': What-a-mess gets rid of an unwanted house guest by transforming himself into a canine version of his hero, Superman.
